actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a 1-year feasibility/suitability study of a national museum of Afro-American history and culture at or near Wilberforce, Ohio.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to prepare and transmit to the Committees on Interior and Insular Affairs of the Senate and the House of Representatives a study of the feasibility and suitability of establishing a National Museum of Afro-American History and Culture at or near Wilberforce, Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a 1-year feasibility/suitability study of a national museum of Afro-American history and culture at or near Wilberforce, Ohio.
